column4: My speaker stopped working on my Ubuntu 10.04 install. Now, I don't have any sound. Any suggestions?
have you changed anything since it's stopped working jarray52?
I'm not sure. It stopped working a couple of weeks ago.
are all the volumes turned up
I typed alsamixer and turned all volumes up.
play around in there and see if it turns on, maybe in the profiles section
try another version Jagst3r15, maybe nvidia-96
I opened pavucontrol and tried all the profile options under configuration.
None of them help with audio.
